document_data.mainbody:
acherani was an erinyes in service to the pit fiend Kurgaloth.
She was cold and furious.
In the late 15 century DR, Tacherani was one of many devils brought to the Lightfinger Estate in Waterdeep to enforce a lapsed infernal contract between Kurgaloth and the Lightfinger family.
When adventurers arrived at the Lightfinger Estate to investigate the chaos that the devils arrival had caused, Tacherani battled them inside the opulent mansion at the Estates center. Although she lost the battle, the adventurers failed to slay her before she could escape.
